jobTitle: Remote Sales Position ($77k to $254K, Qualified Leads, No Cold Calling)
description:
Training Provided!

Join Our Mission to Transform Financial Futures!

We are more than a team; we are a movement dedicated to altering the financial destinies of American families, guiding them from dependence to independence and onward to generational wealth. This isn’t just a sales opportunity; it's an invitation to be part of a significant change.

As a member of our team, whether you're already licensed in Life & Health insurance or willing to take that step, you'll be instrumental in this transformation. Our approach allows you to work from the comfort of your home in a 100% remote position, adapting to today's unique circumstances with tools and methods that support remote engagement with clients.

We're looking for individuals who are self-driven and motivated, with a talent for sales. If you have an entrepreneurial spirit or have been a business owner, you'll fit right in. Our role is 100% commission-based, life and health insurance sales, fueled by high-quality, exclusive leads – not cold calls or lead selling.

We value diverse backgrounds – from Home Improvement to Education – as long as you bring a motivated mindset. Expect to earn an average of $50K part-time and up to $153K full-time in your first year.

Your role is pivotal: empowering lives, freeing families from financial constraints, and opening a world of possibilities. This is your chance to not just earn a living but to enhance lives.

Join us in reshaping America's financial landscape, one family at a time. Be the change. Be the architect of a new financial era. Apply today and step into a role where your impact extends beyond the workplace."

"Ready to start? Here’s what we need:

"
  • Life & Health Insurance License (mentoring available for unlicensed candidates)
  • A motivated, mission-minded mentality
  • Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written
  • The ability to work independently, manage time effectively, and meet deadlines
  • A moderate to High degree of computer proficiency
  • Applicants must be coachable and able to work as part of a team

"Let's transform futures together – starting with YOURS!

"Powered by JazzHR

P8eKeNZxit
